description: A dark-skinned maid who serves as Konoe`s adjutant, she appears in the later Hanaukyo Maid series. She also has to constantly correct other people, insisting that Sanae (typically a first name for girls) is her LAST name. While Konoe sees her as a pupil, Yashima herself is hopelessly and rather blatantly in love with Konoe.
name: Sanae Yashima
